    • Field Detail

      • achievements

        private Achievements achievements

    • Constructor Detail

      • User

        public User(java.lang.String name,
    int num)
        Constructor. If there exists a filename associated with the passed in user name, then this user has chosen an existing user that may have achievements, and the achievements class is filled with data read from existing file. If file is not found, that particular exception is caught and a brand new achievements list is created using the alternate overloaded constructor (for new users) found within the achievements class.
        Parameters:
        name - user name
        num - position index

        Try to play card selected by user

        heartsBroken - indicator whether hearts has been broken
        veryFirstTurn - indicator whether this is a very first turn

      • tokenizeString

        private Card tokenizeString(java.lang.String cardStr,
                  java.util.List<Card> myHand,
                  Card potentialPlay)
        User input is converted from string into tokens. Requires input in the form of "[number] space [first letter of suit]" Both tokens are then compared against card suits and faces in hand to determine if they match.
        Parameters:
        cardStr -
        myHand -
        potentialPlay -
        Returns:
        potentialPlay, which returns either a valid card or null

      • devSkipPass

        private Card devSkipPass(int numCardsToPass)
        Exists to implement a dev testing option of skipping card passing. Works by automatically passing the next highest card in user's hand (note: only works using the console.)
        Parameters:
        numCardsToPass - tells method how many cards are left
        Returns:
        highest card in hand
